{"id":717872708,"lang":"cpp","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1654753943,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"92 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/717872708/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Two Sum IV - Input is a BST","memory":"41.8 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    map<int,int>mp;\n     bool rec(TreeNode* root,int k){\n        if(root==NULL){\n            return 0;\n        }\n        if(mp.count(k-root->val)==0){\n            mp[root->val]=1;\n        }\n         else{\n             return 1;\n         }\n        bool ans=0;\n        TreeNode* left=root->left;\n        TreeNode* right=root->right;\n        if(left!=NULL){\n            ans|=rec(left,k);\n        }\n        if(right!=NULL){\n               ans|=rec(right,k);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n    bool findTarget(TreeNode* root, int k) {\n        bool ans=rec(root,k);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"two-sum-iv-input-is-a-bst"}
